00008 template <class TID, class TDATA>
00009 inline CHeapTree<TID, TDATA>::CHeapTree(int nInitMax) : m_nInitMax(nInitMax)
00010 {
00011         m_nMAX = m_nInitMax;
00012         m_data = new _NODE[m_nMAX];
00013         m_nSize = 0;
00014 }
00015 
00016 template <class TID, class TDATA>
00017 inline CHeapTree<TID, TDATA>::~CHeapTree()
00018 {
00019         delete [] m_data;
00020 }
00021 
00022 template <class TID, class TDATA>
00023 inline void CHeapTree<TID, TDATA>::Insert(const TID &id, const TDATA &data)
00024 {
00025         if (m_nSize == m_nMAX - 1)
00026         { // Resize the m_data array by doubling its size.
00027                 m_nMAX += m_nMAX;
00028                 _NODE *pTemp = m_data;
00029                 m_data = new _NODE[m_nMAX];
00030                 for (int j = 0; j < m_nSize; j ++)
00031                         m_data[j] = pTemp[j];
00032                 delete [] pTemp;
00033         }
00034 
00035         _NODE node = { id, data };
00036         m_data[m_nSize] = node;
00037         int iCur = m_nSize ++;
00038         int iParent = (iCur - 1) / 2;
00039         while (iParent >= 0 && m_data[iParent].data > m_data[iCur].data) {
00040                 _NODE t = m_data[iCur];
00041                 m_data[iCur] = m_data[iParent];
00042                 m_data[iParent] = t;
00043                 iCur = iParent;
00044                 iParent = (iCur - 1) / 2;
00045         }
00046 }
00047 
00048 template <class TID, class TDATA>
00049 inline bool CHeapTree<TID, TDATA>::RemoveTop()
00050 {
00051         if (IsEmpty()) return false;
00052 
00053         if (m_nSize == m_nMAX / 2)
00054         { // Resize the m_data array by shrinking its size twice.
00055                 m_nMAX /= 2;
00056                 _NODE *pTemp = m_data;
00057                 m_data = new _NODE[m_nMAX];
00058                 for (int j = 0; j < m_nSize; j ++)
00059                         m_data[j] = pTemp[j];
00060                 delete [] pTemp;
00061         }
00062         m_data[0] = m_data[-- m_nSize]; // move the last elem to the first place
00063         _ReformatHeap(0);
00064         return true;
00065 }
00066 
00067 template <class TID, class TDATA>
00068 inline bool CHeapTree<TID, TDATA>::RemoveAll()
00069 {
00070         if (IsEmpty()) return false;
00071         delete [] m_data;
00072         m_nMAX = m_nInitMax;
00073         m_data = new _NODE[m_nMAX];
00074         m_nSize = 0;
00075         return true;
00076 }
00077 
00078 template <class TID, class TDATA>
00079 inline bool CHeapTree<TID, TDATA>::ResetData(const TID &id, const TDATA &dataNew)
00080 {
00081         for (int j = 0; j < m_nSize; j ++)
00082                 if (m_data[j].id == id) {
00083                         if (m_data[j].data < dataNew) {
00084                                 m_data[j].data = dataNew;
00085                                 _ReformatHeap(0);
00086                         }
00087                         else {
00088                                 m_data[j].data = dataNew;
00089                                 _NODE node = m_data[j];
00090                                 int iCur = j;
00091                                 int iParent = (iCur - 1) / 2;
00092                                 while (iParent >= 0 && m_data[iParent].data > m_data[iCur].data) {
00093                                         _NODE t = m_data[iCur];
00094                                         m_data[iCur] = m_data[iParent];
00095                                         m_data[iParent] = t;
00096                                         iCur = iParent;
00097                                         iParent = (iCur - 1) / 2;
00098                                 }
00099                         }
00100                         return true;
00101                 }
00102                 return false; // id not found
00103 }
00104 
00105 template <class TID, class TDATA>
00106 inline bool CHeapTree<TID, TDATA>::GetData(const TID &id, TDATA *pdata) const
00107 {
00108         for (int j = 0; j < m_nSize; j ++)
00109                 if (m_data[j].id == id) {
00110                         *pdata = m_data[j].data;
00111                         return true;
00112                 }
00113         return false; // not found
00114 }
00115 
00116 template <class TID, class TDATA>
00117 inline void CHeapTree<TID, TDATA>::_ReformatHeap(int iRoot)
00118 {
00119         int iChild = 2 * iRoot + 1; // left child index
00120         if (iChild < m_nSize)
00121         {
00122                 int iRightChild = iChild + 1; // right child index
00123                 if (iRightChild < m_nSize)
00124                 {
00125                         if (m_data[iChild].data > m_data[iRightChild].data)
00126                                 iChild = iRightChild;
00127                 }
00128                 if (m_data[iChild].data < m_data[iRoot].data) {
00129                         _NODE t = m_data[iRoot];
00130                         m_data[iRoot] = m_data[iChild];
00131                         m_data[iChild] = t;
00132                         _ReformatHeap(iChild);
00133                 }
00134         }
00135 }
